channel.title: How To Change Your Home?
channel.description:
[b]Basicly Im New Too All This Coding And Server Making But Ive Downloaded A Client And A Source And Ive Done The Stuff I Need For Now But I Wanna Know How To Change Home's The Current Source I Got The Home Is Pest Control
Somebody help :)[/b]

item.title: How To Change Your Home?
item.dc:creator: @collide collide
item.description:
@collide wrote:

It depends, on what source your using, for example because I’m using PI and OverloadX source I would change home by doing this, this file is found in SRC - Server, Config.Java generally.

[code]public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 3214; // start here
public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 3424;[/code]

You would change this to what ever you wanted to, now you would have to go and find the relevant files to change the Home teleport. Now this is found in ClickingButtons.Java

        [code]//home teleports
case 4171:
case 50056:
case 117048:
String type = c.playerMagicBook == 0 ? "modern" : "ancient";
c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.VARROCK_X, Config.VARROCK_Y, 0, type);	
c.shakeScreen(1, 0, 0, 0);
break;[/code]

All this should allow you do change homes. Now don’t get me wrong I’m a new coder to but I’ve learnt the basics ^^

Read full topic

item.title: How To Change Your Home?
item.dc:creator: @demon_fox337 demon fox337
item.description:
@demon_fox337 wrote:

hmm if you spawn by edge bank like i do try searching for this toX = 3086+misc.random(3); toY = 3499+misc.random(3); 3086 and 3499 are orig coords and the misc.random(3) adds a number i think 0-3 to the original coords making you spawn anywhere randomly within 3 squares

Read full topic

item.title: How To Change Your Home?
item.dc:creator: @JuniorCautionz JuniorCautionz
item.description:
@JuniorCautionz wrote:

demon fox337:

if you spawn in the same spot every time for different chars search your player.java for the coords you spawn at

Na Every time i teleported it changed my spot
and also i found a tut how to change home
but when i change my
X And Y Coords It Didnt Change Home :S
